programme.desc: Sgt. Voight encourages Lt. Casey to go under cover in order to obtain proof of Jack Nesbitt's shady dealings; tensions grow between Otis and Severide; Herrmann helps another member of the firehouse.

programme.desc: Lt. Casey ends up in danger as he continues to investigate Jack Nesbitt; Boden tries to create unity in the house; Cruz and Boden put their lives on the line to save their own when a warehouse blaze gets out of control; Dawson receives news.

programme.desc: While a Navy Seal is on a secret mission, his young daughter is kidnapped; Danny must find $18.5 million in order to save his brother.

programme.desc: An investigation becomes personal for Danny when a serial killer attaches a message for him on his latest victim.

programme.desc: A traumatized young woman who was held hostage is reluctant to press charges; a prominent NYPD fundraiser becomes a PR nightmare for Frank; Jamie is offered a job on a TV show.
